item.title: Brave x Junction adds PS5, PS4, and Switch versions
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Exhibiting at Tokyo Game Dungeon 9.

Blackjack RPG Brave x Junction will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam in 2025, developer RideonJapan announced. The console versions are newly announced.

The game will also exhibit at Tokyo Game Dungeon 9, which will take place on August 3 at the Tokyo Metropolitan Industrial Trade Center. A playable demo and original novelty goods will be available.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Brave x Junction is an RPG where you battle monsters in a back-and-forth contest of blackjack, the playing card game familiar to many.

Defeat the monsters and delve dungeons. A fun tale of adventure all while being simple to play.

Key Features

  • Blackjack Style Turn-Based Battle System
    • Battles are a one-on-one turn-based system.
    • Who has the closest number to 21 in their hand? They deal an attack to the opponent!
    • Three distinctive playable characters make an appearance: The Fighter, with a head on battle-like creed; the Thief, unrivaled in sensing danger and thwarting it; and the Magician, who employs trickery at will!
    • Leave your strategy to chance? Entrap the enemy with trickery? The way you enjoy is up to you, the player.
  • Diverse Array of Monsters
    • Slimes, orcs, dragons, and monsters, familiar to fantasy RPGs all lurk out of the depths, one after another.
    • Card hand concealing ghosts, trolls that surpass the 21-card value limit, and many more with a diverse array of skills stand in the way of the player.
    • Monsters from Rideon Japan‘s Adventure Bar Story and Mercenaries Saga series games even make an appearance!
  • Loads of Factors to Augment, Unfolding a Blackjack Victory
    • Acquire boost cards as you advance the adventure, strengthening status and learning skills.
    • Abilities come along with some weapons and accessories, and at the Armory & Forge in town, synthesis can allow for unbound customization.
    • Combining skills with abilities? This could bring to life new tactics.
    • Can you traverse the untrodden dungeons? It’s all up to you, the player!

A demo for Brave x Junction is currently available for PC via Steam.

item.title: Suikoden Live broadcast set for August 5
item.content:encoded:
Various new information over an hour and 30 minutes.

Konami will host its third Suikoden Live broadcast on August 5 at 4:00 a.m. PT / 7:00 a.m. ET / 20:00 JST, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube.

The broadcast, which will run for one hour and 30 minutes, will feature “various new information,” the details of which were not specified.

Suikoden I & II HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and Microsoft Store on March 6, followed by Switch 2 on June 5. A new title, Suikoden STAR LEAP, is currently in development for PC (Steam), iOS, and Android.

item.title: Toxic Crusaders launches December 4
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Side-scrolling beat 'em up game dated.

Side-scrolling beat ’em up game Toxic Crusaders will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on December 4 for $24.99, developer Retroware announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

When the evil Dr. Killemoff attacks, only one team of hideously deformed creatures of superhuman size and strength stands between him and his plans for global pollution: the Toxic Crusaders, earth’s last, greatest and ugliest hope for survival! The hottest heroes of 1991 return for a radical, radioactive beat ’em up for a new era, featuring awesome action, crushing combos and more toxic waste than you’ll know what to do with!

It’s Clean-Up Time!

Choose from seven playable characters, including Toxie, No-Zone, Junkyard, Major Disaster and Headbanger (who would technically count as two characters if they could only agree on something)—plus, for the first time, play as Toxie’s musically “gifted” girlfriend Yvonne, and the mother of all mothers, Mrs. Junko, Toxie’s mom!

Battle across seven disgusting levels rendered in beautiful full-color pixel art as you defend Tromaville from hordes of Radiation Rangers, mutated thugs and zombie chickens. The odds might be stacked against you but with awesome powers, a winning personality and up to four-player local co-up on your side, the Smogulan Empire’s days are numbered!

Straight Outta Tromaville!

Take a deep breath and dive deep into an action-packed, pun-filled adventure that drags you kicking and screaming through the wonderful world of Troma. Enjoy cameos from gore-filled classics such as Class of Nuke ‘Em High, Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead, and Sgt. Kabukiman N.Y.P.D.—reimagined in the Saturday morning cartoon style that made this franchise so unforgettable!

Key Features

  • The triumphant return of the Toxic Crusaders, just when we needed them most!
  • Pulse-pounding beat ’em up action for up to four players.
  • Gorgeous full-color pixel art graphics.
  • A stunning soundtrack that’ll make you party like it’s 1991.
  • Amazing comic book cutscenes featuring the voices of TeamFourStar (Dragon Ball Z Abridged).
  • Seven playable characters, each with their own unique moves and powers.
  • Seven unique stages taking you from the streets of Tromaville to Planet Smogula and beyond!
  • Surprise cameos (each more surprising than the last) from across the Troma Cinematic Universe!

Watch a new trailer below.
